title: Mahou Shoujo Isuka
synopsis: The evil stone conceives a part of the king of the hell's power in a different world. To prevent his revival, the stone is implanted into a body of a magical girl! Now the clans from the hell follow after her. The evil stone cannot be regained by a simple destruction of the body. Thus, they start disgracing the magical girl in various ways!
staff: [['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Makino, Yukihiro', ['Storyboard']], ['Yakushi, Ruri', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition']], ['Lilith Soft', ['Original Creator']]]
